---
title: "calendar"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(shiny)
library(toastui)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

ui <- fluidPage(
  h2("Calendar with Messages"),
  fluidRow(
    column(8, calendarOutput("my_calendar"))
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {

  df <- read_csv("../data/processed/margaux.csv")  


  calendar_data <- df %>%
    mutate(
      id = row_number(),
      calendarId = 1,
      title = text,
      start = as.Date(date, tz = "UTC"),   
      end = as.Date(date, tz = "UTC"),
      isAllDay = TRUE,                     
      isReadOnly = TRUE
    ) %>%
    select(id, calendarId, title, start, end, isAllDay, isReadOnly)

  output$my_calendar <- renderCalendar({
    calendar(calendar_data, navigation = TRUE, useDetailPopup = TRUE) %>%
      cal_props(
        list(
          id = 1,
          name = "Messages",
          color = "white",
          bgColor = "firebrick",
          borderColor = "firebrick"
        )
      )
  })

  output$dates <- renderPrint({
    input$my_calendar_dates
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
